p:
Furthermore, the OER activities of the oxides were examined by CV scan sweeps between 1.2 and 1.8 V vs. RHE with an electrode rotation speed of 1600 rpm at a scan rate of 10 mV s â€“1 in O 2-saturated 1 M KOH at ambient temperature. OER currents were obtained from taking the average of forward and backward sweep of the 10th cycle to ensure that the capacitive currents had been removed.
68 Electrolyte solutions were saturated by O 2 bubbling for 1 h prior to the measurements. To compare the intrinsic activities of CMOs, ORR and OER specific activities were calculated by normalizing measured currents using BET specific surface areas.
